author: cmpilato
msg: Simplify, simplify, simplify the high-level merge logic!
Tired of seeing the same sorts of stuff done in multiple places, I've
been on a roll tonight (or on a broom, perhaps) with cleaning up
merge.c.  In this episode, we find the high-level call flow simplified
(do_file_merge, do_directory_merge): Don't open RA sessions -- use
the ones in the merge context baton.
(merge_source_t): Lose 'path1' and 'path2' fields in favor of 'url1'
parameter, and calculate full URLs for the merge sources.  Also,
don't create merge sources that are lacking one or both of their
(do_merge): New, forged from the common guts of both
both of these into do_merge().  These now just do some setup stuff
and then call do_merge() for all the merge heavy lifting.

author: joeswatosh

and libsvn_diff to provide consumers with the ability to output unified diff
paths relative to a particular directory."
